forum.content:
time to wake up with a ridiculous dream,

take out all the blind, foolish and cheat,

brings yourself walk into a realized,

put down the angry, sadly and pain,

let your mind and step to the paradise.

Hey, did you hear that?
Listen to my heart beat for you,
give me your hands, please,
let me lead you to the new world.


中文#
是時候從一個荒謬的夢境清醒了

讓所有盲目，愚昧和期盼釋放

讓自己走入現實

放下所有忿怒，傷心及痛苦

讓你的心靈步入天堂。



我是SAKU 我是朔 。
forum.title: 天堂 paradise.
